text: Day-Time Wife is a 1939 American comedy movie directed by Gregory Ratoff and starring Linda Darnell, Tyrone Power, Wendy Barrie, Warren William, Binnie Barnes, Joan Davis. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. == References == ==Other websites== * * * Category:1939 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Gregory Ratoff Category:English-language movies Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Day-Time Wife
